-:2:-
4. Nature:- We are members of a Hindu undivided family. The 1st of us is the father of the 2nd of us. The 2nd of us is the only son of the 1st of us.
We have all the rights and we are enjoying the said property jointly and freely.
In this situation, in order to avoid any misunderstandings between us in the future regarding the property inherited jointly due to the time and circumstances and for the convenience of our family, we have divided our immovable and movable assets into the unequal shares mentioned below in the presence of our village elders, family members and well-wishers and get a probate deed written.
The cash value of the schedule.... Rs.25,000/- is
A-
B- The value of the immovable property of the schedule.... Rs.7,27,000/- is
divided into shares as follows and this distribution deed is to be written. Except for the immovable and movable assets of the joint family mentioned in this deed, there is no other immovable and movable assets of the joint family to be divided. There are no other heirs to share the immovable assets as per the said schedule. Although there are ups and downs in the division of assets as per the schedule, it is stipulated that we should not ask each other for money.
The land, water, treasure, deposits, and all other things available in the assets as per the schedule shall be freely enjoyed by their descendants, In case any shareholder files any claim in the future regarding the assets of the said shares, the shareholder who files such claim shall bear all the expenses and expenses and shall continue to execute this deed of trust without interruption. We have signed this deed of trust with each other that we have not committed any kind of trespass against anyone else regarding the assets of the said shares. The persons to whom the schedule of the assets has been received shall complete and submit the patta transfer forms for the changes in the accounts of the Panchayat. The taxes, etc. payable to the government and the Panchayat on the assets of the schedule of the assets shall be paid by the persons to whom the schedule of the assets has been received. There is no reason for others. Till now, our joint family has neither any debts due from others nor any debts that we have to pay to others. From now on, no matter what debts anyone has incurred, they will have to pay them to someone. The said property belongs to Mallavol village, Gudur mandal. 1.
K. Nancharaya
2. K. Veeranjaneyu 30th day of July, 2022

Declaration:- We hereby declare that the land transferred by this deed does not have any trees or plantations like mango, coconut, betel nut, sweet potato, precious minerals, mines, granite or other precious stone mines, missionary, fish ponds, poultry farms or sheds and we hereby consent to prosecution against us in accordance with law if any such factual information is found to have been concealed in this deed at any time by the Government. We declare that we are liable for the payment of the duty, fee
Penalty.

reportJson.assessmentNo: As Per Deed. 1460, As per HTR 1460(Old), 203182001201 (New)

sections.content: The property acquired by Kanaparti Veeranjaneyulu by virtue of Partition Deed No. 8064 of 2022, dated 04/Aug/2022, being the Schedule-'B' measuring an extent of 242 Sq. Yds. (or) 2178 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 10-110, Assessment No. 1460, comprised in survey number 517/1, situated in Mallavolu Village & Grama Panchayati, Gudur Mandal, within the District of Krishna, registered at sub-registrar office Gudivada, is bounded as follows: North by: Property Of Kanaparti Adiseshu South by: Property Of Gunturu Venkata Ratnam East by: Panchayati Road West by: Property Of Pandraka Venkayya Note: It is to be noted that our legal verification is limited towards the property offered as security for the purpose of loan, i.e., the Schedule-'B' property of the Partition Deed.

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 517/1, bearing house no. 10-110, Assessment No. 1460, situated in Mallavolu measuring about 242 Sq. Yds. (or) 2178 Sq. Ft., was originally owned by 1. Kanaparti Nancharaiah, 2. Kanaparti Veeranjaneyulu, who acquired the property through inheritance from their ancestors. [Ref.Deed] 2. The aforementioned Kanaparti Nancharaiah and Kanaparti Veeranjaneyulu executed a Partition Deed on 04/Aug/2022, registered as document No. 8064 of 2022, before the SRO Gudivada, amongst them Kanaparti Veeranjaneyulu acquired right over Schedule 'B' property of partition deed measuring 242 Sq. Yds. (or) 2178 Sq. Ft., bearing house no. 10-110, Assessment No. 1460, comprised in survey number 517/1, situated in Mallavolu. 3. The aforementioned Kanaparti Veeranjaneyulu executed Mortgage Deeds dated 30/Aug/2022 and 26/Feb/2024, registered as Document Nos. 8926 of 2022 before the SRO, Gudivada, and 19050 of 2024 before the SRO, Machilipatnam, respectively, in favour of M/s. Five Star Business Finance Limited, Machilipatnam Branch, towards the property admeasuring 242 Sq. Yds. (or) 2178 Sq. Ft., situated at Mallavolu. [Ref. EC] Note: It is to be noted that Mortgage Document Numbers. 8926 of 2022 & 19050 of 2024, is currently active with Five Star Business Finance Limited Machilipatnam, Branch. Upon inquiry with the F.I., they reverted to release a conditional report. Therefore, it is advisable to obtain a Receipt Deed before proceeding with the loan disbursement. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : The Property Tax Receipt imprinted by the Mallavolu Gram Panchayath discloses that Kanaparthi Nancharaiah has paid property tax for the period 2025-26 towards Assessment No. 1460 (Old), 203182001201 (New).

The property tax receipt attached discloses that Kanaparti Nancharaiah is the taxpayer, hence, it is presumed that the mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner Kanaparti Veeranjaneyulu.

sections.content: We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Kanaparti Veeranjaneyulu, possesses a clear and valid title to the property measuring 242 Sq. Yds. (or) 2178 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 10-110, Assessment No. 1460, comprised in survey number 517/1, situated in Mallavolu Village & Grama Panchayati, Gudur Mandal, within the District of Krishna, registered at sub-registrar office Gudivada. Subject to discharge of active mortgages vide Doc. Nos.  8926 of 2022 & 19050 of 2024.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
